DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether researcher help people change amount time spend sit activity whether change might improve health outcome .
DOC.criteria: Enrolled University Kansas ( KU ) Alzheimer 's Disease Center ( ADC ) Registry Clinical Dementia Rating ( CDR ) = 0.5 Inactive status determine Measure Older Adults ' Sedentary Time ( MOST ) questionnaire Retired < 20 hours/week office Lives partner community dwell set Unable stand walk unassisted Inadequate visual , auditory , English language capacity Adhesive allergy Current uncontrolled Type 2 diabetes Unwilling change sit behavior
